modals.errors.charSetup.noCharacter: There was an error loading your character. Please try again later.
modals.startPanel.title: Welcome to Fantasy Frontiers!
modals.startPanel.description:
Embark on an extraordinary journey in a mystical land filled with endless opportunities and adventures! In Fantasy Frontiers, you'll find yourself in a vibrant world where every choice shapes your destiny.

As a newcomer to the kingdom of Seafall, youâ€™ll start by creating a unique character to explore this enchanting world. Your character can join various guilds, undertake challenging quests, forge alliances, and gradually earn a noble title with land possessions from the kingdom. Engage in conversations, build your skills, and navigate through formal and friendly contexts as you interact with a diverse range of NPCs.

Your adventure begins here! Ready to unveil the mysteries and make a name for yourself in the realm of Fantasy Frontiers? Click "Start your fantasy journey!" to begin your quest!

modals.charSetup.character.title: Character creation
modals.charSetup.character.error.noFirst: Please enter a first and last name.
modals.charSetup.language.title: Language selection
modals.charSetup.language.description: Select your preferred language for the game.
modals.charSetup.starterSkill.title: Choose your first skill
modals.charSetup.starterSkill.descriptio: Choose your first skill. Some of them are unique and cannot be learned afterward. You can choose between the following skills:
skill.MEGALUCK.description: Rare skill that increases your luck by +20
skill.MANA_CONTROL.description: Skill that increases your mp by +5, your intelligence by +3 and your magic by +1
skill.ANCIENT_FIGHTING_SKILLS.descriptio: Ancient skill that increases your strength by +8, your vitality by +5, your dexterity by +3 and your agility by +4

command.setup.subcommands.panels.descrip: Setup the panels for the game.
